story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Google: In the Future, We Will All Wear Sci-Fi Glasses
caption: mashable.com
description: If Google's research arm, Google X, has its way, we will start wearing some very science fiction-like glasses by year's end.

data.message: Brilliant ... These guys just keep me AMAZED !
who Google?! there is only limited products were they really does a good job but in total they are not good in anything out of search engines andGgoogle Apps
Are you kidding me ?? i will not reply that silly comment but just 3 words GOOGLE IS INTERNET

Dude are you kidding me! Chrome Sucks in many aspects! if you intend to take chrome to the Edge it really Suck! http://www.webdesignerdepot.com/2009/02/is-google-chrome-the-new-ie-6-for-web-designers/
What about this/! do you call this a product????? http://www.google.com/sites/help/mobile-landing-pages/mlpb.html :)

So why is it shaking the IE Empire and close to become number 1, if any thing annoying with chrome that will be the continuous updating, which make most of plug-ins look retarded, 
Also think about their revolutionary products like chrome os, google apps, goggles, gmail, ... believe me GOOGLE owns the INTERNET
